CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, "Plantyn"), "PU - " & TEXT(ShippingIndicationRule__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, "Noordhoff"), "NU - " & TEXT(ShippingIndicationRule__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, "Liber"), "LI - " & TEXT(ShippingIndicationRule__c), "")))
CustomField.label: Shipping Indication Rule Netsuite
